response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its value exceeds $8,000. Considering its unique benefits and the investment it represents, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and is subject to availability. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 9500}
